description: This is a test file for the NotesService class, testing various CRUD operations, toggling favorites, and search functionality related to notes stored in localStorage.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: A service class managing note objects, including creation, retrieval, update, delete, favorite toggling, and search functionalities.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with specified title and body, assigns an ID, and saves it to localStorage.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Returns an array of all notes stored in localStorage.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates the note with given ID with new title and body.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID from localStorage.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a note by ID.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches notes for a substring in title or body and returns matching notes.
